mean_cn: n.正文，原文，课文；课本；  v.发送短信
mean_en: the main printed part of a book or magazine, not the notes, pictures, etc.; any form of written material; the written form of a speech, a play, an article, etc.
sentence: Mary is reading the text before answering the exam question.
sentence_trans: 在回答考试问题前，玛丽正在阅读正文。
